Articles.Content:
I've my first "Tour" mission. I have to land on Mun, Minmus, Duna and Ike. This is not hard. I even use my generic "aero-lander" (rocket SSTO), so I can ferry a second one to my Duna station. 

My question : Am I allowed to dock during this mission ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-20T07:41:27Z" title="07/20/2015 07:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 20, 2015</time> by Warzouz**
Yes, as long as one of the capsules or probes are present for the required events, docking and undocking makes no difference.
Cool, I'll refuel at my various space stations, then.

OK, finally I checked I landed on the moon, travalled to Minmus, refuels at my station and landed of minmus. All landings were validated. 

Now I'm waiting for the Duna window, in a year...
